page.title: 09THE TREHARRIS JOB CENTRE
page.content: Sat thirty percent and with the possibility of the colliery closing in the near future prospects of reducing unemployment figures are not promising. -------------------------------------- A visit to Treharris Job Centre. We visited Treharris Job Centre early in July and after asking a series of questions we were able to deduct the following information. The job centre had been open for the past ten years and had been managed by a Mrs. James from the outset. The job centre is open three days a week, Mondays, Tuesdays and Wednesdays nine thirty a.m. to twelve noon. Mrs. James has sixty to seventy unemployed people coming to the job centre each week. She said the busiest days were Tuesday and Wednesday and they sometimes stay open later on those days.We were told
